---
id: delete-node
title: "Delete Node"
description: "Deletes a registered node by node URL. This endpoint is useful when a node is no longer available but it's still present in the database."

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete Node"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/registry-svc/node/{url}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes a registered node by node URL. This endpoint is useful when a node is no longer available but it's still present in the database.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Node URL","in":"path","name":"url","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"204":{"description":"No Content"},"400":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"registry_svc.ErrorResponse"}}},"description":"Invalid ID"},"401":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"registry_svc.ErrorResponse"}}},"description":"Unauthorized"},"404":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"registry_svc.ErrorResponse"}}},"description":"Service not found"},"500":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"registry_svc.ErrorResponse"}}},"description":"Internal Server Error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
